channel.title: Productivity on theAutomationDude
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on theAutomationDude

item.title: VSCode productivity features and keyboard shortcuts
item.description: When you get used to VSCode you will experience a boos to your productivity. Some repetitive tasks when writing code are drastically reduced, with language support, intellisense and more, you don’t even need to remember the syntax very well. Keyboard shortcuts is another important feature when coding, since you don’t want to take your hands off the keyboard to use the mouse too often. Keyboard Shortcuts There is a keyboard shortcuts reference as https://code.
